attributes.action: Update the Water Charge calculation to include number of occupants and income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current method of calculating the Water Charge for a property is totally unfair as it does not include any consideration of the number of occupants at a particular property, or their income. Some one living alone, on benefits, in a flat can end up paying more (or as much) than a family in a three bedroom house!
